lines: 1. Kaparo yath mar Kalwari,Ka ma Ruodhwa Yesu notho,Akwano mwandu ka nono,Anego sunga mar chunya.
2. Ruoth, kik iyie mond` apakraMak kuom tho Kristo Nyasacha;Gik ma nono maywayoaAchiwogi kuom remb Yesu.
3. Kuom wiye, luetene, tiende,Rembe nochwer koherowa;Noyie malit nikech jopiny,Notho mond` omiwa ngima.
4. Da piny duto obed mara,Dobed mich ma ok dak nyal rom;Hera maduong` kama noyud chunya,Ringra, ngima duto.
